title: Introduction to Hypnotherapy for Stress & Anxiety
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Stress & Anxiety audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Stress & Anxiety audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.

title: Anxiety
body:
This Anxiety Release guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who might be feeing anxious, overwhelmed, out of control or fearful.

 When a person is anxious, they are normally worried about something that might happen in the future.  So, anxiety is often problem solving and worrying about something that might not even happen. Anxiety is a response in your body to make you alert, prepared and ready to act for your benefit. But sometimes it doesn’t work for your benefit as your anxious thoughts can overwhelm you making you feel out of control and fearful.  In our session we will teach you some breathing exercises to help you remain calm and in control and replace those feelings of anxiety with feelings of calmness.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you feel much more in control and less anxious.
teaser: This Anxiety Release guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who might be feeing anxious, overwhelmed, out of control or fearful.

title: Depression
body:
This meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people suffering from mild depression. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. We all feel low from time to time. Often this will quickly ease and we’ll go back to feeling like our usual selves. For some people, however, this low mood persists and affects everyday life.  Depression is a condition that causes you to feel low for a prolonged period of time. You may be struggling to carry out day-to-day activities or have lost interest in activities that you used to find enjoyable.  In our session we will help you understand the route cause and push out any feelings of negativity that may be holding you back in life.  We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you feel less depressed.
teaser: This meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people suffering from mild depression.

title: Negative Thoughts
body:
This ‘Negative Thought Release’ guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who are in a pattern of thinking negatively about yourself and your surroundings. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Whilst everyone experiences negative thoughts now and again, negative thinking that seriously affects the way you think about yourself and the world around you can have a significant impact on your work, relationships and every day life.  In our session we will help you deduce your negative thoughts and replace with positive thoughts and feelings - giving you a growing realisation that you are in control of your thoughts. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so feel more positive day to day.
teaser: This Negative Thought Release guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who are in a pattern of thinking negatively about yourself and your surroundings.

title: Positive Thinking
body:
This ‘Positive Thinking’ guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who would like to think and feel more positive.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Positive thinking is an emotional and mental attitude that focuses on the good and expects results that will benefit you. It’s about anticipating happiness, health and success – essentially, training yourself to adopt an abundance mindset and to cultivate success. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so think and feel much more positively.
teaser: This ‘Positive Thinking’ guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who would like to think and feel more positive.

title: Releasing Stress
body:
This Releasing Stress guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who want to feel less stressed.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Stress can come from many different aspects of your day to day life - such as an increased workload, an argument you have had with a partner, friend or family, existing financial worries or just day to day worries.  During these situations you may feel threatened or upset so that your body creates a stress response, this in turn can cause a variety of physical symptoms, changing the way you behave, think and act.  In this session we will help you take control back, releasing any feelings of stress so you are ready to embrace eacy day with a fresh, positive mind.  Feeling calm and relaxed, recognising that stress no longer serves you. `We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to help you manage your stress levels.
teaser: This Releasing Stress guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who want to feel less stressed.

title: Worry Less
body:
This Worry Less guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who want to stop worrying.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Worrying is a form of thinking about the future and thinking about future events in a way that leaves you feeling anxious or apprehensive.  But truth is, there is little or no point in you worrying about something that might or might not happen. In our session we will help you be more resilient, feel more calm and relaxed, help you let go of stress, anxiety and worries so you feel more assured that everything will work out just as it should. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways so you feel less worried each and every day.
teaser: This Worry Less guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who want to stop worrying.
